statements: UPDATE renewable_energy_components SET component_name='Solar Panel', quantity=100, price=5000.00 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE renewable_energy_components SET supplier_name='Green Energy Co.', component_type='Wind Turbine', price=3000.00, quantity=50 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE renewable_energy_components SET price = 200.50, quantity = 100 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE renewable_energy_components SET component_name = 'Solar Panels', supplier_name = 'EcoTech', price = 499.99 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE solar_panels SET brand='SunPower', power_output=300, price=500, quantity=10 WHERE id=1;
UPDATE batteries SET price=200, brand='Duracell', quantity=20, capacity=50 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE solar_panels SET quantity = quantity - 1, price = price * 0.95 WHERE id = 1
UPDATE batteries SET price = price + 50, capacity = 150 WHERE brand = 'Duracell'
UPDATE solar_panels SET quantity = 10 WHERE brand = 'SunPower';
UPDATE batteries SET brand = 'Sony', capacity = 500 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE solar_panels SET wattage = 400, quantity = 10 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE batteries SET capacity = 2000, voltage = 12 WHERE brand = 'Example Battery';
UPDATE SolarPanels SET price = 5000.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Batteries SET brand = 'ACME Batteries', price = 200.50 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE SolarPanels SET price = 5000.00, wattage = 400 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Batteries SET capacity = 10000, price = 1200.50, brand = 'ABC' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE solar_panels SET price = 350.00 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE batteries SET type = 'Lithium-ion' WHERE brand = 'Duracell';
UPDATE solar_panels SET price = 1200, efficiency = 0.85 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE batteries SET price = 500, type = 'Lithium-Ion' WHERE brand = 'Duracell';
